description: Lists statistics about the data collected for each of the sensors that have been successfully ingested in the particular dataset. Can also be used to retreive Sensor Statistics for a previous ingestion job.

parameters.name: DatasetName
parameters.description: The name of the dataset associated with the list of Sensor Statistics.

nested_items.name: SensorStatisticsSummaries
nested_items.description: Provides ingestion-based statistics regarding the specified sensor with respect to various validation types, such as whether data exists, the number and percentage of missing values, and the number and percentage of duplicate timestamps.

nested_items.name: ComponentName
nested_items.description: Name of the component to which the particular sensor belongs for which the statistics belong to.

nested_items.name: SensorName
nested_items.description: Name of the sensor that the statistics belong to.

nested_items.name: DataExists
nested_items.description: Parameter that indicates whether data exists for the sensor that the statistics belong to.

nested_items.name: MissingValues
nested_items.description: Parameter that describes the total number of, and percentage of, values that are missing for the sensor that the statistics belong to.

nested_items.name: Count
nested_items.description: Indicates the count of occurences of the given statistic.

nested_items.name: Percentage
nested_items.description: Indicates the percentage of occurances of the given statistic.

nested_items.name: InvalidValues
nested_items.description: Parameter that describes the total number of, and percentage of, values that are invalid for the sensor that the statistics belong to.

nested_items.name: Count
nested_items.description: Indicates the count of occurences of the given statistic.

nested_items.name: Percentage
nested_items.description: Indicates the percentage of occurances of the given statistic.

nested_items.name: InvalidDateEntries
nested_items.description: Parameter that describes the total number of invalid date entries associated with the sensor that the statistics belong to.

nested_items.name: Count
nested_items.description: Indicates the count of occurences of the given statistic.

nested_items.name: Percentage
nested_items.description: Indicates the percentage of occurances of the given statistic.

nested_items.name: DuplicateTimestamps
nested_items.description: Parameter that describes the total number of duplicate timestamp records associated with the sensor that the statistics belong to.

nested_items.name: Count
nested_items.description: Indicates the count of occurences of the given statistic.

nested_items.name: Percentage
nested_items.description: Indicates the percentage of occurances of the given statistic.

nested_items.name: CategoricalValues
nested_items.description: Parameter that describes potential risk about whether data associated with the sensor is categorical.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Indicates whether there is a potential data issue related to categorical values.

nested_items.name: NumberOfCategory
nested_items.description: Indicates the number of categories in the data.

nested_items.name: MultipleOperatingModes
nested_items.description: Parameter that describes potential risk about whether data associated with the sensor has more than one operating mode.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Indicates whether there is a potential data issue related to having multiple operating modes.

nested_items.name: LargeTimestampGaps
nested_items.description: Parameter that describes potential risk about whether data associated with the sensor contains one or more large gaps between consecutive timestamps.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Indicates whether there is a potential data issue related to large gaps in timestamps.

nested_items.name: NumberOfLargeTimestampGaps
nested_items.description: Indicates the number of large timestamp gaps, if there are any.

nested_items.name: MaxTimestampGapInDays
nested_items.description: Indicates the size of the largest timestamp gap, in days.

nested_items.name: MonotonicValues
nested_items.description: Parameter that describes potential risk about whether data associated with the sensor is mostly monotonic.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Indicates whether there is a potential data issue related to having monotonic values.

nested_items.name: Monotonicity
nested_items.description: Indicates the monotonicity of values. Can be INCREASING, DECREASING, or STATIC.

nested_items.name: DataStartTime
nested_items.description: Indicates the time reference to indicate the beginning of valid data associated with the sensor that the statistics belong to.

nested_items.name: DataEndTime
nested_items.description: Indicates the time reference to indicate the end of valid data associated with the sensor that the statistics belong to.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: An opaque pagination token indicating where to continue the listing of sensor statistics.
